info.title: API Documentation
info.description: API Documentation for the Online Course application

post.description: Endpoint to authenticate user with email and password.

500.description: An error occurred while authenticating

post.description: Endpoint to register a new user.

500.description: An error occurred while registering user

get.description: Endpoint to get comments based on content ID.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving comments

post.description: Endpoint to create a new comment.

500.description: An error occurred while creating comment

put.description: Endpoint to update an existing comment.

500.description: An error occurred while updating comment
An error occurred while disabling comment

post.summary: Get comments made by a user
post.description: Endpoint to retrieve comments made by a specific user.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving comments

post.description: Endpoint to upload new multimedia content (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF, MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV) to a course.

500.description: An error occurred while uploading multimedia content

get.description: Endpoint to get the content for a specific course.

200.description: List of content for the course

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving content
An error occurred while updating content

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the content to be disabled

500.description: An error occurred while disabling content

put.description: Endpoint to update the order of content.

500.description: An error occurred while updating content order

get.description: Endpoint to get the status of deactivated content.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving content status

put.description: Endpoint to change the status of content to active.

500.description: An error occurred while changing content status
An error occurred while retrieving private content

put.description: Endpoint to change the privacy of content to private.

500.description: An error occurred while changing content privacy

get.description: Endpoint to get public and active content.

200.description: List of public and active content

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving public and active content
An error occurred while retrieving public content

put.description: Endpoint to make a content public.

500.description: An error occurred while making content public

get.description: This endpoint retrieves enrolled courses. Requires authentication token.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving enrolled courses

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new course.

500.description: An error occurred while creating the course
An error occurred while retrieving courses
An error occurred while updating the course
An error occurred while disabling the course

put.description: Endpoint to change the active status of a course.

500.description: An error occurred while changing course status

get.description: Endpoint to get the list of inactive courses.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving courses

put.description: Endpoint to make a course private.

200.description: Course status changed to private successfully

500.description: An error occurred while changing course status

get.description: Endpoint to get the list of private courses.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving courses

get.description: Endpoint to find courses by keyword.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search for courses

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving courses

get.description: Endpoint to get the list of public and active courses.

200.description: List of public and active courses

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving courses

get.description: Endpoint to get the list of courses uploaded by the user.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving courses

put.description: Endpoint to make a course public.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to be made public

500.description: An error occurred while updating the course

get.description: Endpoint to get the list of public courses.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving courses

post.description: This endpoint enrolls a user in a course.

200.description: User enrolled in the course successfully

500.description: An error occurred while enrolling the user in the course

post.description: This endpoint unenrolls a user from a course.

200.description: User unenrolled from the course successfully

500.description: An error occurred while unenrolling the user from the course

get.description: This endpoint finds enrollments by keywords. Requires authentication token.

500.description: An error occurred while finding enrollments

get.description: This endpoint retrieves public and active enrollments for a user. Requires authentication token.

200.description: Public and active enrollments retrieved successfully

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving public and active enrollments

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new qualification.

500.description: An error occurred while creating the qualification

put.description: This endpoint updates an existing qualification.

500.description: An error occurred while updating the qualification

put.description: This endpoint is used to change the role of a user.

500.description: An error occurred while changing the user's role

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new role.

500.description: An error occurred while creating the role

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all roles with pagination.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving roles

put.description: This endpoint updates an existing role.

500.description: An error occurred while updating the role

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new user.

500.description: An error occurred while creating the user

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all users with pagination.

500.description: An error occurred while retrieving users

put.description: This endpoint updates an existing user.

500.description: An error occurred while updating the user

put.description: This endpoint disables an existing user.

500.description: An error occurred while disabling the user
